::SnowCat::

She heard him speak of the clearing."And be out in the open for this 
bot to have a better shot at me? Are you nuts?"  Her instincts told 
her to listen to this bot.  She felt stupid for doing it, but she ran 
for the clearing.  She was jogging more than running.  She ran back 
through the trees.  She weaved in and out through the groves and into 
the clearing.  She stayed near the trees, but out far enough to get a 
clear shot at the bot trying to kill her.  She stopped and tried to 
catch her breath.  


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DeathScythe/Ramulus::
> 
> DeathScythe chuckles to himself. He was above the new bot, as the 
scanners 
> reported. He slows down slightly, continuing to fly above SnowCat.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus nods. "Good. I am too."
> 
> He dodges a tree, continuing to gallop. "There's an enemy chasing 
you, you 
> probably know that by now. Can you make it to the nearest clearing?"
> 
> He knew that she would be in more danger in a clearing, but if he 
could get 
> there, he was sure that he could fight DeathScythe off.
